channel.title: PyBites - Digest
channel.description: Python Code Challenges, Articles and News - One Bite a Day

item.title: Twitter Digest 2018 Week 01
item.description: Every weekend we share a curated list of 15 cool things (mostly Python) that we found / tweeted throughout the week.
item.dc:creator: PyBites
